title: Luxury Suite
name: Royal Suite

name: Executive Suite
description: Experience comfort and style in our Executive Suite. Ideal for business travelers or those seeking a bit of extra space and luxury.

title: Family Room
name: Family Suite
description: Enjoy quality time with your loved ones in our spacious Family Suite. Equipped with all the essentials for a comfortable stay.

title: Penthouse Suite

description: Live the high life in our luxurious Penthouse Suite. Unparalleled views and lavish amenities await.
